about_the_game:
A Roguelike Dungeon Adventure Full of Thrills and Danger!

Enter the depths of a treacherous dungeon in The Glory Dungeon Raider, a fast-paced 2D roguelike where every run is a new challenge! Arm yourself with various weapons, and face off against deadly creatures. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Features:

🔹 Procedurally Generated Dungeons – No two runs are the same! Explore ever-changing dungeon layouts filled with enemies, traps, and loot.

🔹 Dynamic Combat System – Wield an arsenal of weapons, each with unique mechanics. Switch between guns and melee weapons to suit your playstyle.

🔹 Challenging Enemy Variety – Face terrifying foes, from the tongue-lashing LongTongue to the cunning Vampire gunner. Watch out for minibosses who guard powerful rewards!

🔹 Resource Management – Collect ammo, reload at the right moment, and make every shot count as you battle through relentless waves of enemies.

🔹 Retro-Inspired Pixel Art – Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted pixel-art world with eerie dungeon atmospheres and dynamic lighting effects.

🔹 Tactical Light-Based Gameplay – Use your flashlight and ambient light sources to your advantage, exposing hidden dangers and revealing paths forward.

Survive, adapt, and conquer the dungeon to achieve Glory! Will you be the ultimate Dungeon Raider?
